title: Why can I not post on any of the other boards?
body: For some strange reason, I can only post to Help & Support instead of any of the other various boards. Can someone please explain?

replies.body: Some regions of the boards have different level requirements to post in that section.  Each section will tell you what level you'll need to be when trying to make a comment or post.  Hope that helps!
I am level 30 though, or does the website have its own leveling?
